goal.ch: This course (TOEIC Test 1) is the first in a series of two, devised to develop students’ English proficiency in the general context of the workplace with a focus on five aspects of the language: vocabulary knowledge, grammar acquisition, listening competency, reading comprehension, and test-taking strategies. To be precise, it aims to advance students’ fundamentals and tactics required for TOEIC (Test of English for International Communication), which can officially certify their workplace English level and appreciably enhance their employment profile.
goal.en: This course (TOEIC Test 1) is the first in a series of two, devised to develop students’ English proficiency in the general context of the workplace with a focus on five aspects of the language: vocabulary knowledge, grammar acquisition, listening competency, reading comprehension, and test-taking strategies. To be precise, it aims to advance students’ fundamentals and tactics required for TOEIC (Test of English for International Communication), which can officially certify their workplace English level and appreciably enhance their employment profile.

**整學年的課程規劃及課群差異性請參見以下網站: https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1AGbuB1WozBj4bXVMRQtl3OGEH9eil9Ql。(註: 可自行決定修課順序，例如，可先修 “TOEIC Alternative 2”， 再修 “TOEIC Test 1”。)

outline.en:
**Click the following link for the one-whole-year program schedule and for the key difference between “TOEIC Alternative“ track and “TOEIC Test“ track: https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1AGbuB1WozBj4bXVMRQtl3OGEH9eil9Ql. (Note: There is no pre-requisite to any of the courses offered by the program; students can take them in
order of preference.)
**Language acquisition takes time and effort on a regular basis.
**Our lessons and evaluations start from Week 1 for all students, the registered or the interested. If you can‘t make it, you can provide school approval for an excused absence or use our bonus scheme to make up for the loss.
**Class announcements will be posted on new ee-class in due course: https://ncueeclass.ncu.edu.tw/. Students are required to follow the announcements posted on there on a weekly basis.
